node.title: VERSEⁿ’s Sera Alba Releases First-Ever Original EP
node.description: Sera Alba, one of the VTubers from Sony Music Entertainment Japan’s VERSEⁿ lineup, has launched her first-ever original extended playlist (EP) titled ‘Ego’. As part of the EP release, a lyric video for ‘Liar’ was released on August 10 at 8PM (JST).
